articles.title: Drake's New Mixtape Loses No. 1 to Kenny Chesney - XXLMAG.COM
articles.description: Details here.
articles.content:
Drake's streak of No. 1 debuts has ended.
On Sunday (May 10), Billboard released this week's Billboard 200 top 10. Drizzy's new Dark Lane Demo Tapes mixtape came in second place to country music superstar Kenny Chesney's Here and Now album. The race to No. 1… [+1426 chars]

articles.title: Amanda Holden opens up on 'excruciating' moment at Simon Cowell's house 'I bit the bullet' - Express
articles.description: AMANDA HOLDEN - who judges Britain's Got Talent alongside Simon Cowell, Alesha Dixon and David Walliams - has opened up about an 'excruciating' moment while she was around BGT co-star Simon's house.
articles.content:
Amanda went on to add: "Chris [her husband] and I had a baby born sleeping in an NHS hospital, and then the following year our lovely daughter Holly, our rainbow baby.
"But then I had an awful birth, I went into a coma so that was horrendous and they held Ch… [+370 chars]

articles.title: Andy Serkis raises nearly £300,000 in 12-hour ‘Hobbit’ readathon - NME
articles.description: Gollum actor Andy Serkis has raised nearly £300,000 for charity with his readathon for 'The Hobbit', which saw him read the entire book in one sitting.
articles.content:
Andy Serkis has raised £280,000 with his The Hobbit readathon this week.
The actor, who plays Gollum in the classic film series, read the whole J.R.R. Tolkein book in one sitting on Friday (May 8).
It took the actor just under 11 hours to finish the book, a… [+1624 chars]
